thread.section_title: Price 4 Limo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Price 4 Limo | price4limo.com
thread.title: Cathy

author: Cathy
title: Cathy
text: From the first phone call to get information about your transport services to the moment we were dropped off at home, you made our day exceptional! We had 35 people gathered to go watch the Dolphins/Patriots game in Miami on New Years Day. The bus was clean and beautiful, our driver was on time, friendly and helpful and it gave us all the opportunity to enjoy a fun filled day! We can't wait to do it again!! Thank you!!!
